Tabs

Rounded tab navigation. Used mostly as secondary navigation on Meetup; load the tab content with web:ajax where possible.

.nav-tabs, .nav-tabs--subtle

  • Upcoming Meetups
  • Past Meetups
  • Selected tab
  • Upcoming Meetups
  • Past Meetups
  • Selected tab
<ul class="nav-tabs">
	<li><a href="#">Upcoming Meetups</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">Past  Meetups</a></li>
	<li class="selected"><a href="#">Selected tab</a></li>
</ul>
<ul class="nav-tabs nav-tabs--subtle">
	<li><a href="#">Upcoming Meetups</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">Past  Meetups</a></li>
	<li class="selected"><a href="#">Selected tab</a></li>
</ul>
